title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 13 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 13 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Because they are not in the majority, maskless Democrat legislators fly out of Texas on taxpayer-funded private planes to deny Republicans a vote on voter ID. Jen Psaki says the "onslaught of voter suppression laws" in red states are "the worst challenge to our democracy since the Civil War." Both Clay and Buck call that statement "crazy." New liberal narrative: If a Democrat loses an election, it's because of racism. Texas Governor Abbott: Democrats who fled Texas to stop democracy will 'be arrested' immediately upon return. Kamala Harris supports the weakening of democracy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Because they are not in the majority, maskless Democrat legislators fly out of Texas on taxpayer-funded private planes to deny Republicans a vote on voter ID. Jen Psaki says the "onslaught of voter suppression laws" in red states are "the worst challenge to our democracy since the Civil War." Both Clay and Buck call that statement "crazy." New liberal narrative: If a Democrat loses an election, it's because of racism. Texas Governor Abbott: Democrats who fled Texas to stop democracy will 'be arrested' immediately upon return. Kamala Harris supports the weakening of democracy.
